subject: The Skinny: Friday, April 20, 2007
body:

  The Early Show | CBS Evening News | 48 Hours | 60 Minutes | The Saturday Early Show | CBS Sunday Morning | Face The Nation 





Alberto Gonzales Strikes Out
 The morning newspapers are unanimous in rating Alberto Gonzales' 
      appearance yesterday before a 
      Senate panel a disaster for the embattled attorney general. 
      And despite jogging and dieting 
      and obsessing about remaining youthful, baby boomers may not be as healthy 
      as they think. 
      Joel Roberts has the highlights of the day's headlines.  More...
 
      
Joel Robertstheskinny@cbs.com
